pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Power Rangers Dino Charge (2015, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft the Red Ranger's $(l:dino_charge/devices/dino_charge_morphers#red_dino_charge_morpher)Red Dino Charge Morpher$(/l) $(br2)Used to access the Red Ranger's $(l:dino_charge/rangers/dino_charge_red)Base$(/l) forms
